choices.D: Send malware to MISP for detonation
choices.B: Auto-extract MITRE-ATT&CK™ information from MISP attributes and associate them to SIR security incidents
choices.E: Add security incident associated observables as attributes to a MISP event
choices.C: Attribute enrichment including adding or updating tags, galaxies, or attributes
choices.A: Dedicated MISP workspace for managing major security incidents

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
Key features

Support manual and automatic observable enrichment. Results include the MISP attribute and event information that is associated with the observables.
Attribute enrichment in MISP which includes adding or updating tags, galaxies, or comments.
Event creation in MISP from SIR: Supports manual and the automatic creation of events in MISP from SIR.
Update a MISP event from SIR which includes adding or updating tags, galaxies, or attributes.
Add security incident associated observables as attributes to a MISP event.
Auto-extract MITRE-ATT&CK™ information from MISP attributes and associate the information to SIR security incidents.
Automatically add SIR MITRE-ATT&CK™ information as galaxies to a MISP event.

questions.question_text: Select all of the following which are key features of the Malware Information Sharing Platform (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
As described on p. 116

questions.question_text: Select all of the following which are the target personas for MITRE ATT&CK 2.0? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
Security incidents can be created manually using the form or automatically from security events received from integrated third-party alert monitoring tools such as Splunk.

questions.question_text: There are several methods in which security incidents can be raised, which broadly fit into one of these categories: __________. (Choose two.)
How does a user modify Risk Scores to suit their organizational needs?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The Risk Score Configuration module allows administrators to define the factors that are considered when calculating risk scores and adjust the weightings of those factors. This provides flexibility to tailor the risk scoring to your organization’s specific risk tolerances and priorities.

Selected Answer: A
Look at page 227

choices.B: amend constants in the RiskScoreUtil script include
choices.A: alter values in the Risk Score Configuration module
choices.D: recode logic in the Risk Score Calculator
choices.C: change the business impact for affected Business Services and Configuration Items

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CDE
CDE is correct
I think the correct answer is C,D,E
